name: Alien invasion: Tower defense
description:
Alien invasion: Tower defense game is the definitive Tower Defense Strategy game that’s easy to pick up, engrossing to play, and hard to set down.

Strategically place your towers on the map to prevent alien enemies from stealing your power cores. Play just for fifteen minutes or several hours!

Features:
- Battle 9 different enemy types. As the levels progress, the enemies become tougher and more difficult to defeat.

- High quality visuals and Graphics

- Featuring 8 different tower types with 3 levels of capability each. Each tower has unique trade offs that affect ideal placement
